## Conversation.addUser() method

Adds a user to this conversation (requires `ConversationMemberFlags.IsOwner`<!-- -->)

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  userId | [User](./client.user.md)<!-- -->\['id'\] | The user identifier |
